77 
88 void MmwDemo_edmaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
89 {
90  int32_t errorCode;
91 
92  errorCode = EDMA_init(DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE);
93  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
94  {
95  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d initialization returned error %d\n", errorCode);
96  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
97  return;
98  }
99 
100  memset(&obj->EDMA_errorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_errorInfo));
101  memset(&obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo));
102 }
103 
111 void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle, EDMA_errorInfo_t *errorInfo)
112 {
113  gMmwDssMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_errorInfo = *errorInfo;
114  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
115 }
116 
124 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle,
125  EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo_t *errorInfo)
126 {
127  gMmwDssMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo = *errorInfo;
128  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
129 }
130 
141 static void MmwDemo_edmaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
142 {
143  int32_t errCode;
144  EDMA_instanceInfo_t edmaInstanceInfo;
145  EDMA_errorConfig_t errorConfig;
146 
147  obj->edmaHandle[DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE] = EDMA_open(DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE,
148  &errCode, &edmaInstanceInfo);
149 
150  if (obj->edmaHandle[DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE] == NULL)
151  {
152  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the EDMA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
153  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
154  return;
155  }
156 
157  errorConfig.isConfigAllEventQueues = true;
158  errorConfig.isConfigAllTransferControllers = true;
159  errorConfig.isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled = true;
160  errorConfig.eventQueueThreshold = EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX;
161  errorConfig.isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors = true;
162  errorConfig.callbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn;
163  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn;
164  errCode = EDMA_configErrorMonitoring(obj->edmaHandle[DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE], &errorConfig);
165  if (errCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
166  {
167  //System_printf("Error: EDMA_configErrorMonitoring() failed with errorCode = %d\n", errCode);
168  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
169  return;
170  }
171 }
172 
183 void MmwDemo_edmaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
184 {
185  EDMA_close(obj->edmaHandle);
186 }
187 
198 void MmwDemo_dataPathInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
199 {
200  memset(obj, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_DataPathObj));
201 
202  /* Initialize EDMA */
203  MmwDemo_edmaInit(obj);
204 }
205 
216 void MmwDemo_dataPathOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
217 {
218  /*****************************************************************************
219  * Open EDMA driver instance
220  *****************************************************************************/
221  MmwDemo_edmaOpen(obj);
222 }
223 
234 void MmwDemo_dataPathClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
235 {
236  /* DPC close */
237  DPM_deinit(obj->objDetDpmHandle);
238 
239  /* Close EDMA driver */
240  MmwDemo_edmaClose(obj);
241 }
